chapters.title: Chapter 24: A Strengthening Storm
chapters.info: Fera, p. 560 (677)—Aes Sedai of the White Ajah. She is one of those under the instruction of the Wise Ones now. She is actually of the Black Ajah, though Elza was unaware of this until she arrived in Cairhien. She is not in Elza's heart.
